title.narrative: TR Third Access to Finance for SMEs (SME III)

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to improve access to medium and long-term finance for small and medium enterprises through lease financing.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Co-financing Requirement | Description :The Borrower shall ensure that the Borrower and/or PFIs use their ownfunds (that is, other than Loan proceeds) to finance Sub-projects, which shall be appraised, selected and supervised in accordancewith the Operations Manual, by at least twenty-five percent (25%) of the Loan, in accordance with the provisions made in LoanAgreement Schedule 2 Section I.A. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Reflows Requirement | Description :The Borrower shall re-lend for one additional lending cycle to the same orother PFIs an amount equal to the amount which shall have been on-lent to the PFIs in the first instance, in accordance with theprovisions made in Loan Agreement Schedule 2 Section I.A. | Frequency :Yearly
Section I, C.4.6 (d) is deleted in its entirety in line with the new procurement framework
Section I, Part B.2.3 is amended to lift on lending limit of US $ 60 million per leasing company
